info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Berkshire, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Albany, northeastern Greene and southern Rensselaer Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 541 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cheshire to near Ravena. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Chatham, Nassau, New Baltimore, Ravena, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Kinderhook, Hancock, Berkshire, Coeymans, Dalton, Ghent, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Stuyvesant, Canaan, Richmond and Windsor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
